title: Ain Soph.Ripple
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion
description: The fourth Ain Soph, this one opened Dec 2015 and is more casual, cafe style. Location is in Kabukicho/Shinjuku near Seibu Shinjuku station North exit. Serves plant-based cuisine with veggie burgers, burritos, salad bowls, and even French toast.
fb: http://www.facebook.com/AIN-SOPHripple-アインソフ-リプル-歌舞伎町店-1296520207085305
